title: Nostalgic For Noir? Feiffer's 'Kill My Mother' Is A Toxic Treat
teaser: In his first graphic novel, Jules Feiffer, 85, has returned to the seedy comic strips, hard boiled novels and B movies of his youth. Maureen Corrigan says it's "a mulligan stew of murder and desire."
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
